title: Telling Siri to ‘Charge My Phone to 100%’ Summons Police
subtitle: Siri can do a lot of things, but she won't summon police surreptitiously in response to the command "charge my phone to 100 percent."
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Telling Siri to "charge my phone to 100 percent" will cause the virtual assistant to surreptitiously dial 911 or summon emergency services.
